member.summary: Replaces the SVG document for this page.
member.param: New SVG document to use for this page. This value can be **null**.
Options to use when caching this SVG document. It can be used to drop images, text or shapes before the document is saved
2. This method requires that the owner document uses a cache system
3. If the value of the IsReadOnly property of LEADDocument is **true**, then
GetSvg will check the cache first, hence, subsequent calls will return the value set by this method.
Refer to Loading Using LEADTOOLS Documents Library for more information.
